solution_line_template: Each bottle of 2 liters of water costs ${total_cost_six_bottles}/{number_of_bottles} = $<<{total_cost_six_bottles}/{number_of_bottles}={cost_per_bottle}>>{cost_per_bottle}.
So the cost of 1 liter of water is ${cost_per_bottle}/{liters_per_bottle} = $<<{cost_per_bottle}/{liters_per_bottle}={cost_per_liter}>>{cost_per_liter}.
